name: Cosmic Carton
description:
Cosmic carton is a virtual reality game, HTC VIVE compatible.

For our first VR game, we wanted to make a shooter playing an M.I.B agent.

--

Cosmic Carton has been made by :

Martin Calujek - Game Designer - Level Designer

Thibault Chergui - FX Artist

Antoine Cuviliez -  Game Art

Justin Duhez - Programmer

Antoine Nisoli - Character Programmer

Raphael Stella  - System Programmer  - Character Programmer
